grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 糧【カテ】food, provisions, nourishment (mental, spiritual, etc.), sustenance (e.g. of one's life), source of encouragement
衣糧【イリョウ】food and clothing
兵糧【ヒョウロウ】(army) provisions, food
kun reading compounds: 糧【かて】food, provisions, nourishment (mental, spiritual, etc.), sustenance (e.g. of one's life), source of encouragement
日々の糧【ひびのかて】one's daily bread
心の糧【こころのかて】food for thought
